## WorkerServiceProtocol.CreateServiceRequest interface

This message is sent by the main thread to \[\[WorkerServiceManager\]\] to dynamically create a new service.

May throw `UnknownServiceError` if service of given type is not registered in \[\[WorkerServiceManager\]\], see \[\[isUnknownServiceError\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface CreateServiceRequest extends ServiceRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [targetServiceId](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.createservicerequest.targetserviceid.md) | string | The newly created service instance will be available under this id. |
|  [targetServiceType](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.createservicerequest.targetservicetype.md) | string | Type of service to be created. \[\[WorkerServiceManager.register\]\] |
|  [type](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.createservicerequest.type.md) | [Requests.CreateService](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.requests.createservice.md) |  |
